character_info.name: Mangosteen
character_info.hint: hidden in a blade of grass, oh no not again...

sections.info: A smiling Mangosteen with its arms up.
sections.obtaining: near the beehive (right side of City), he's hiding as one of the blades of grass. (use [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EegvYWZK5gY this tutorial] if you get stuck)
